alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 6:23PM CDT until September 21 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 21 miles southwest of North Platte, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
